akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5306. Definitions As used in this subchapter:(1) SecretaryThe term “Secretary” means the Secretary of the Treasury.
(2) BoardThe term “Board” means the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.
(Pub. L. 100–418, title III, § 3006, Aug. 23, 1988, 102 Stat. 1375.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThis subchapter, referred to in text, was in the original “this subtitle”, meaning subtitle A (§§ 3001–3006) of title III of Pub. L. 100–418, Aug. 23, 1988, 102 Stat. 1372, which is classified principally to this subchapter. For complete classification of subtitle A to the Code, see Tables.
(1) Secretary The term “Secretary” means the Secretary of the Treasury.
(2) Board The term “Board” means the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.
